requirements: Access to a GROMACS Singularity container
Starting structure, .top, .ndx and .mdp files with the same name as the script
Files should be in the same folder as the script
notes: The script uses a singularity container for GROMACS 2021.4 CPU only
The script runs jobs in four-hour blocks with checkpointing and resubmission
The script uses the 'general' partition and the 'a_omara' account on the Slurm cluster
The script uses 48 CPUs per task and a maximum run time of 4 hours
